articles.description: Running back Josh Jacobs is expected to report to the Raiders before their season opener in three weeks, multiple league sources have indicated.
articles.content: Running back Josh Jacobs is expected to report to the Raiders before their season opener in three weeks, multiple league sources have indicated.But with only a few practices remaining before the club… [+2873 chars]
